items.title: Let the Good Times Roll: 2 Stocks Showing No Signs of Slowing
items.description: Two overlooked companies that have nonetheless staged massive rallies in recent months may merit further consideration by momentum-focused investors.

items.title: Café Culture Revival? 3 Stocks to Watch After Chick-fil-A’s Move
items.description: Chick-fil-A’s new Daybright café concept could reignite interest in beverage-driven dining; here are three restaurant stocks investors should watch

items.title: Carmakers Step in With Incentives as EV Tax Credit Expires
items.description: As the federal government ends its EV tax credit, legacy automakers have moved to offer their own incentives to keep EV sales rolling.

items.title: Buy the Dip? Zillow’s Profit Comeback Meets Market Pressure
items.description: Zillow stock faces pressure from an FTC lawsuit despite strong mortgage growth and a return to profitability for the first time in over a decade

items.title: Don’t Miss These 3 Hidden Aerospace Gems Before They Take Off
items.description: Three relatively unknown aerospace companies could be in for big gains, but they also present some risks that investors should consider.
